transformations.name: MapDriftProduct
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as double,
		ListPrice as double,
		Size as string,
		Weight as double,
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as date,
		SellEndDate as date,
		DiscontinuedDate as date,
		ThumbNailPhoto as string,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Product
source(output(
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ParentProductCategoryID as integer,
		Name as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ProductCategory
source(output(
		ProductDescriptionID as integer,
		Description as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ProductDescription
source(output(
		ProductModelID as integer,
		Name as string,
		CatalogDescription as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ProductModel
source(output(
		ProductModelID as integer,
		ProductDescriptionID as integer,
		Culture as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ProductModelProductDescription
source(output(
		Column_1 as integer,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Address
source(output(
		Column_1 as integer,
		Column_2 as boolean,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string,
		Column_13 as string,
		Column_14 as string,
		Column_15 as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Customer
source(output(
		CustomerID as long,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Suffix as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		SalesPerson as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Phone as string,
		PasswordHash as string,
		PasswordSalt as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		HashKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> DimCustomer
source(output(
		AddressID as integer,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		StateProvince as string,
		CountryRegion as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		HashKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> DimAddress
ProductModelProductDescription, ProductDescription join(ProductModelProductDescription@ProductDescriptionID == ProductDescription@ProductDescriptionID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProdDescandProdModProdDesc
Product, ProductCategory join(Product@ProductCategoryID == ProductCategory@ProductCategoryID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProdandProdCat
ProductModel, JoinProdandProdCat join(ProductModel@ProductModelID == Product@ProductModelID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProdModandProdProdCat
JoinProdModandProdProdCat, JoinProdDescandProdModProdDesc join(ProductModel@ProductModelID == ProductModelProductDescription@ProductModelID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProduct
JoinProduct select(mapColumn(
		ProductModelID = ProductModel@ProductModelID,
		ProductDescriptionID = ProductDescription@ProductDescriptionID,
		ProductCategoryID = Product@ProductCategoryID,
		ProductID,
		ProductModelID = ProductModel@ProductModelID,
		ModelName = ProductModel@Name,
		CatalogDescription,
		ProductName = Product@Name,
		ProductNumber,
		Color,
		StandardCost,
		ListPrice,
		Size,
		Weight,
		SellStartDateID = SellStartDate,
		SellEndDateID = SellEndDate,
		DiscontinuedDateID = DiscontinuedDate,
		ModifiedDateID = Product@ModifiedDate,
		ProductCategoryName = ProductCategory@Name,
		Culture,
		Description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectProduct
SelectProduct pivot(groupBy(Description),
	pivotBy(Culture),
	DescriptionCulture = max(Description),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: false) ~> PivotProduct
PivotProduct derive(DescriptionCultureAr = toString(byName('DescriptionCulturear    ')),
		DescriptionCultureEn = toString(byName('DescriptionCultureen    ')),
		DescriptionCultureFr = toString(byName('DescriptionCulturefr    ')),
		DescriptionCultureHe = toString(byName('DescriptionCulturehe    ')),
		DescriptionCultureTh = toString(byName('DescriptionCultureth    ')),
		{DescriptionCultureZh-cht} = toString(byName('DescriptionCulturezh-cht'))) ~> MapDriftProduct
MapDriftProduct, SelectProduct join(PivotProduct@Description == SelectProduct@Description,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProduct1
JoinProduct1 aggregate(groupBy(ProductID),
	DescriptionCultureAr = max(DescriptionCultureAr),
		{DescriptionCultureEn    } = max(DescriptionCultureEn),
		{DescriptionCultureFr   } = max(DescriptionCultureFr),
		DescriptionCultureHe = max(DescriptionCultureHe),
		DescriptionCultureTh = max(DescriptionCultureTh),
		{DescriptionCultureZh-cht} = max({DescriptionCultureZh-cht})) ~> AggProdDesc
AggProdDesc, SelectProduct join(AggProdDesc@ProductID == SelectProduct@ProductID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProduct2
JoinProduct2 select(mapColumn(
		ProductID = SelectProduct@ProductID,
		ProductModelID,
		ProductDescriptionID,
		DescriptionCultureAr,
		{DescriptionCultureEn    },
		{DescriptionCultureFr   },
		DescriptionCultureHe,
		DescriptionCultureTh,
		{DescriptionCultureZh-cht},
		ProductCategoryID,
		ModelName,
		ProductName,
		ProductCategoryName,
		ProductNumber,
		Color,
		Size,
		ListPrice,
		StandardCost,
		Weight,
		SellStartDateID,
		SellEndDateID,
		DiscontinuedDateID,
		ModifiedDateID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectProduct2
SelectProduct2 aggregate(groupBy(ProductID,
		ProductModelID,
		ProductCategoryID,
		ModelName,
		ProductName,
		Color,
		ProductNumber,
		ProductCategoryName,
		Size,
		ListPrice,
		StandardCost,
		Weight,
		SellEndDateID,
		SellStartDateID,
		DiscontinuedDateID,
		ModifiedDateID),
	DescriptionCultureAr = max(DescriptionCultureAr),
		{DescriptionCultureEn    } = max({DescriptionCultureEn    }),
		{DescriptionCultureFr    } = max({DescriptionCultureFr   }),
		DescriptionCultureHe = max(DescriptionCultureHe),
		DescriptionCultureTh = max(DescriptionCultureTh),
		{DescriptionCultureZh-cht} = max({DescriptionCultureZh-cht})) ~> AggProduct
Customer select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID = Column_1,
		NameStyle = Column_2,
		Title = Column_3,
		FirstName = Column_4,
		MiddleName = Column_5,
		LastName = Column_6,
		Suffix = Column_7,
		CompanyName = Column_8,
		SalesPerson = Column_9,
		EmailAddress = Column_10,
		Phone = Column_11,
		PasswordHash = Column_12,
		PasswordSalt = Column_13,
		ModifiedDate = Column_14
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCustomer
SelectCustomer derive(HashKey = sha2(256, iifNull(Title,'') +FirstName +iifNull(MiddleName,'') +LastName +iifNull(Suffix,'') +iifNull(CompanyName,'') +iifNull(SalesPerson,'') +iifNull(EmailAddress,'') +iifNull(Phone,''))) ~> CreateCustomerHash
CreateCustomerHash, DimCustomer exists(CreateCustomerHash@HashKey == DimCustomer@HashKey,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists
Exists, DimCustomer lookup(SelectCustomer@CustomerID == DimCustomer@CustomerID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupCustomerID
LookupCustomerID derive(ModifiedDate = currentTimestamp()) ~> SetDates
SetDates alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AllowUpserts
SelectAddress derive(HashKey = sha2(256,AddressLine1 +iifNull(AddressLine2,'') +iifNull(City,'') +iifNull(StateProvince,'') +iifNull(CountryRegion,'') +iifNull(PostalCode,''))) ~> CreateAddressHash
Address select(mapColumn(
		AddressID = Column_1,
		AddressLine1 = Column_2,
		AddressLine2 = Column_3,
		City = Column_4,
		StateProvince = Column_5,
		CountryRegion = Column_6,
		PostalCode = Column_7,
		ModifiedDate = Column_8
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectAddress
Exists1, DimAddress lookup(SelectAddress@AddressID == DimAddress@AddressID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupAddressID
CreateAddressHash, DimAddress exists(CreateAddressHash@HashKey == DimAddress@HashKey,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
LookupAddressID derive(ModifiedDate = currentTimestamp()) ~> SetDatesAddress
SetDatesAddress alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> AllowUpsert
AggProduct sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ProductID as integer,
		ModelName as string,
		ProductName as string,
		Color as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		ProductCategoryName as string,
		Size as string,
		ListPrice as decimal(8,2),
		StandardCost as decimal(8,2),
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		SellEndDateID as timestamp,
		SellStartDateID as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDateID as timestamp,
		ModifiedDateID as timestamp,
		DescriptionCultureAr as string,
		DescriptionCultureEn as string,
		DescriptionCultureFr as string,
		DescriptionCultureHe as string,
		DescriptionCultureTh as string,
		{DescriptionCultureZh-cht} as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ProductID,
		ModelName,
		ProductName,
		Color,
		ProductNumber,
		ProductCategoryName,
		Size,
		ListPrice,
		StandardCost,
		Weight,
		SellEndDateID,
		SellStartDateID,
		DiscontinuedDateID,
		ModifiedDateID,
		DescriptionCultureAr,
		DescriptionCultureEn = {DescriptionCultureEn    },
		DescriptionCultureFr = {DescriptionCultureFr    },
		DescriptionCultureHe,
		DescriptionCultureTh,
		{DescriptionCultureZh-cht}
	)) ~> SinkProductDimension
AllowUpserts sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		CustomerID as long,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Suffix as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		SalesPerson as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Phone as string,
		PasswordHash as string,
		PasswordSalt as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		HashKey as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['CustomerID'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		CustomerID = SelectCustomer@CustomerID,
		Title = SelectCustomer@Title,
		FirstName = SelectCustomer@FirstName,
		MiddleName = SelectCustomer@MiddleName,
		LastName = SelectCustomer@LastName,
		Suffix = SelectCustomer@Suffix,
		CompanyName = SelectCustomer@CompanyName,
		SalesPerson = SelectCustomer@SalesPerson,
		EmailAddress = SelectCustomer@EmailAddress,
		Phone = SelectCustomer@Phone,
		PasswordHash = SelectCustomer@PasswordHash,
		PasswordSalt = SelectCustomer@PasswordSalt,
		ModifiedDate,
		HashKey = CreateCustomerHash@HashKey
	)) ~> Sink
AllowUpsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		AddressID as integer,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		StateProvince as string,
		CountryRegion as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		HashKey as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['AddressID'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		AddressID = SelectAddress@AddressID,
		AddressLine1 = SelectAddress@AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2 = SelectAddress@AddressLine2,
		City = SelectAddress@City,
		StateProvince = SelectAddress@StateProvince,
		CountryRegion = SelectAddress@CountryRegion,
		PostalCode = SelectAddress@PostalCode,
		ModifiedDate,
		HashKey = CreateAddressHash@HashKey
	)) ~> sink1
